internship-xp: Interniship in software development | April/2021 - September/2021
MSG_SOFTW_1: •  Develop web and mobile applications using technologies such as Java, JDBC, Spring JavaEE, SQL, Angular, and Ionic.
MSG_SOFTW_2: • Support and mentor new team members, promoting collective growth and project success.
MSG_SOFTW_3: • Utilize agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban to ensure efficiency and quality in development.
MSG_SOFTW_4: • Specialize in creating software solutions for the public sector, contributing to projects that serve municipalities across Brazil.
MSG_SOFTWJR_1: • Develop web and mobile applications using technologies such as Java
MSG_INTERN_1: • Set up and maintained computer systems for optimal performance.
MSG_INTERN_2: • Diagnosed and fixed hardware and software issues to ensure smooth operation.
MSG_INTERN_3: • Demonstrated ability to work effectively in a team environment.
MSG_INTERN_4: • After completing the internship, hired as a software engineer at Betha Sistemas.
MSG_IT_1: • Set up and maintained computer systems for optimal performance.
MSG_IT_2: • Diagnosed and fixed hardware and software issues to ensure smooth operation.
MSG_IT_3: • Provided technical support to ensure simulators functioned correctly

my_introduction: Welcome to my presentation! In this video, I provide an overview of my background, skills, and experiences. I hope it gives you a clear understanding of who I am and what I can bring to the table. Please take a moment to watch the video if you could.
